item.title: chatbots
item.description: Was a hook for me to take a topic for my PhD.

item.title: Final Fantasy XV completed (and some comments about it)
item.description: Today, apparently after 70 hours, I finished Final Fantasy XV. While I enjoyed the game at many stages, I got to the last episodes with an urge to finish it. There were still some side quests and things to do, but I felt like I couldn’t bother. Fortunately, not everything was bad, as I went through 70+ hours of game. Personally, I have enjoyed early Final Fantasy games, from the SNES FFIV, FFV and FFVI (the best of the series to me!
